tune.name: Winter in Australia
tune.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
tune.content:
\relative f' <<
  {
    \clef treble
    \key c \major
    \time 6/8

    \repeat volta 2 {
      \partial 8 g8 |
      g c e g, c e |
      a, c e a, c e |
      a, d f a, d f |
      g f e d c b |
      \break

      g c e g, c e |
      a, c e a, c e |
      a, d f a, d f |
      g f e d c b |
      \bar "||" \break

      g'4 g8 e4 e8 |
      gis4 gis8 e4 e8 |
      a g f a g f |
      a g f a g f |
      \break

      g4 g8 e4 e8 |
      gis4 gis8 e4 e8 |
      a g f g f e |
      d c b c4
    }
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s8 |
      c2. | a:m | d:m | c4. g |
      c2. | a:m | d:m | c4. g |

      c2. | e | d:m | d:m |
      c2. | e | d4.:m c | g c4
    }
  }
>>
tune.composer-details:
This tune is heavily inspired by “Christmas in Belgium” by my dear friend
Aymeric Fromherz.
